title: Find all VPC subnets with a specific tag
description: Using AWS CLI to find all VPC subnets with a specific a tag

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The AWS CLI command can find across multiple regions all instances of AWS VPC Subnet that has a specific tag attached

snippets.title: Find all VPC subnets with a specific tag
snippets.description: The following describe-subnets example uses a filter to retrieve the details of those subnets with the tag VPCname=HappyVPC and the --query parameter to display the subnet IDs of the subnets with this tag. You can replace the key pair value to your own tags you to filter in your account.
